channel.title: Automatic players online counter [PI]
channel.description: How can i make it so i add a code in the quest tab, and it automatically updates the characters online? I have something like it atm, but you have to log out then log back in for the player counter to work. This is Hybrid-Pvp source. I guess its PI.
